attributes.action: award Walter Smith, the Manager of Glasgow Rangers FC a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for the sterling work he has done for the Scottish game of football

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
